definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: There was a moment of silence, then everyone but the Princess began to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 片刻寂靜之後，皇族貴胄們鬨堂大笑，除了公主。

sentences.english: Do not be hasty when climbing, sit for a while if you get tired.
sentences.chinese: 登山的時候不能急，累了就小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Could you stay for me, even just a moment?
sentences.chinese: 你可願爲我停留，哪怕只是片刻？

sentences.english: Hot massage for a while, and then use a spoon to stimulate it to soak in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 熱按摩片刻後，再用一把泡在冷水裏的匙子刺激該處。

sentences.english: Taurus will show Capricorn how to enjoy a well-deserved break every so often and how to appreciate beauty and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 牛向魔證實要經常享受生活的片刻，享受美和舒適。

sentences.english: Remaining in the deep water for a while, she begins to kick her way up towards the surface.
sentences.chinese: 她在深水中逗留片刻之後開始踢打着水向水面游去。

sentences.english: Wait a minute and I'll give my shoes a once-over.
sentences.chinese: 請稍等片刻，我把皮鞋略微擦一擦。

sentences.english: The earth belongs to anyone who stops for a moment, gazes and goes on his way.
sentences.chinese: 地球屬於那些停留片刻，凝視它，然後繼續趕路的人。

sentences.english: After dinner my father oftens dozes in his chair for a while.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，我的父親常在他的椅子上小睡片刻。

sentences.english: I gazed awhile, and felt as light, and free.
sentences.chinese: 片刻凝眸間，我頓時覺得輕盈自在。

sentences.english: Danielle thought a moment. "I've never heard of him."
sentences.chinese: 丹尼爾沉吟片刻，“我從來沒聽說過他。”

sentences.english: So presently the light was turned out and for some time there was quietness in the room.
sentences.chinese: 於是迅速地把燈熄滅，然後房間裏是片刻的寂靜。

sentences.english: After a short silence, he burst inro laughter.
sentences.chinese: 在沉默片刻後，他突然哈哈大笑起來。

sentences.english: After work, I always like "Night in Paris" sit awhile.
sentences.chinese: 下班之後，我總喜歡在“夜巴黎”小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Observe the flaws immediately after spraying developer, no need to wait for dryness.
sentences.chinese: 噴塗顯像劑後，片刻即可觀察缺陷，無需等其乾燥。

sentences.english: Only a brief silence marked the drow soldier's passing.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅在卓爾士兵經過時帶來了片刻的寂靜。

definition: a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
half the day/a long time/quite a while
half of the day/a long time/quite a while
a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
